EmailTemplate.description: Email asking Yr7 people to move from SCT to HOS
EmailTemplate.name: Move from SCT to HOS
EmailTemplate.subject: St Andrew's Cathedral School - school tour
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Lead.FirstName}
We have received your booked for our upcoming Senior College Tour. The Senior College Tour is aimed at prospective students considering Year 10 or Year 11 entry into St Andrew's Cathedral School.
As you have indicated that you are considering Year 7 for your child, may I suggest perhaps coming along on our Head of School Tour on [date]? It's more of a whole-of-school tour which provides a great insight into Middle School (Yrs 7 - 9) right through to Senior College (Years 10 - 12).
If you are able to come along on our Head of School Tour, please let me know and I will book you a place. If that date doesn't suit, I can advise of future tour dates that might be more convenient.
Regards
Robyn
Robyn Pedley Enrolments Administrative Assistant
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia
direct 9286 9552 mobile 0404 884 852 email RPedley@sacs.nsw.edu.au phone +61 2 9286 9500 fax +61 29286 9550
